MEN-001.name: Rajiv Mehta
education: ITI in Fitter from Government ITI, Mumbai (1998)
career_highlights: Started as ITI apprentice at Tata Motors
Led major automation project that increased production efficiency by 25%
Mentored over 30 ITI graduates in the past 8 years
mentorship_areas: Transitioning from technician to engineering roles
MEN-001.mentorship_style: Practical guidance with focus on hands-on learning and industry-relevant skills

testimonials.testimonial: Mr. Mehta's guidance helped me transition from being a shop floor technician to a supervisor role. His practical advice and industry insights were invaluable.

MEN-002.name: Priya Desai
education: ITI in Electrician from Government ITI, Pune (2002)
career_highlights: First female electrician in her division at L&T
Developed training program for new ITI apprentices
mentorship_areas: Continuing education opportunities for ITI graduates
MEN-002.mentorship_style: Supportive and encouraging, with focus on building confidence and technical competence

testimonials.testimonial: As a female student in a male-dominated trade, Ms. Desai's mentorship was exactly what I needed. She helped me navigate industry challenges and build my technical capabilities.

MEN-003.name: Mohammed Khan
education: ITI in Mechanic (Motor Vehicle) from Government ITI, Delhi (1996)
career_highlights: Started as apprentice mechanic and rose to head a major service center
MEN-003.mentorship_style: Direct and practical, with focus on real-world problem solving and customer satisfaction

testimonials.testimonial: Mr. Khan's mentorship transformed my approach to automotive repairs. His emphasis on both technical excellence and customer service helped me secure a position at a premium car dealership.

MEN-004.name: Sunita Verma
education: ITI in COPA from Government ITI, Bengaluru (2005)
career_highlights: Transitioned from ITI COPA graduate to IT management
Leads Tech Mahindra's ITI graduate recruitment program
Developed bridge course for ITI graduates entering IT sector
mentorship_areas: IT career pathways for ITI graduates
MEN-004.mentorship_style: Goal-oriented and structured, with focus on clear career planning and skill development

testimonials.testimonial: Ms. Verma helped me create a clear roadmap from my ITI COPA qualification to a successful IT career. Her guidance on additional certifications and skills was spot-on.

MEN-005.name: Harpreet Singh
education: ITI in Welder from Government ITI, Amritsar (2000)
career_highlights: Specialized in high-pressure welding for power plants
Recipient of BHEL's 'Craftsman of the Year' award twice
Represented India at International Skills Competition
MEN-005.mentorship_style: Hands-on demonstration and practice, with strict emphasis on quality and safety

testimonials.testimonial: Mr. Singh's attention to detail and emphasis on quality transformed my welding skills. His mentorship helped me qualify for specialized welding positions that I wouldn't have been eligible for otherwise.
